Def.Label: wood
Def.Description: Wood from trees or other fibrous plants. Useful for building structures and weapons. It is a good fuel for campfires and generators, and can be refined into chemfuel. In a pinch, a piece of wood can be used as a weapon or a leg.

Def.Label: herbal medicine
Def.Description: A pack of herbal concoctions extracted from the healroot plant. It is less potent than industrial pharmaceuticals, but much better than nothing.
